name: Lamb Souvlaki Skewers
description: Greek lamb skewers that go from raw to ready in less than 17 minutes.

ingredients.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning or Rosemary Garlic Seasoning

preparation: Combine first three ingredients. Alternately thread meat and peppers onto bamboo skewers.
Heat oil in a frying pan on medium. Add skewers and fry for 2 minutes on each side.
Place pan in oven and continue to cook for 6–8 minutes until desired doneness.
Drizzle with lemon juice, then serve.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with prepared Dillicious Tzatziki and prepared Classic Greek Salad.

products.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning (Pkg of 3)
summary: A Greek-inspired meal, souvlaki is marinated meat grilled on a skewer, often served with warm pita bread and tzatziki. No grill? No problem. Skip the skewers and put your Sheet Pan to work to make equally tasty Chicken Souvlaki in 20 minutes in the oven.

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavours on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.
